title: Citrus Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['1 (340g) tin tuna in springwater, drained and flaked', '1 tablespoon light soured cream', '1/2 tablespoon mustard', '1 1/2 tablespoons gherkin relish', '2 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '4 tablespoons chopped pecans', 'garlic salt to taste', 'onion powder to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
